member.summary: This event is triggered when an accepted draggable is dropped 'over' (within the tolerance of) this droppable. In the callback, $(this) represents the droppable the draggable is dropped on. ui.draggable represents the draggable

member.summary: Get/Sets whether automatically hides the handles except when the mouse hovers over the element.

member.summary: Gets/Sets prevents resizing if you start on elements matching the selector.

member.summary: Gets/Sets the Control/Element constrains dragging to within the bounds of the specified Control/Element.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.ResizableOptions.StartDelay
member.summary: Tolerance, in milliseconds, for when resizing should start. If specified, resizing will not start until after mouse is moved beyond duration. This can help prevent unintended resizing when clicking on an element.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.ResizableOptions.StartDistance
member.summary: Tolerance, in pixels, for when resizing should start. If specified, resizing will not start until after mouse is moved beyond distance. This can help prevent unintended resizing when clicking on an element.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.ResizableOptions.ShowSemiTransparentHelper
member.summary: Gets/Sets a semi-transparent helper element is shown for resizing.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.ResizableOptions.Handles
member.summary: If specified as a string, should be a comma-split list of any of the following: 'n, e, s, w, ne, se, sw, nw, all'. The necessary handles will be auto-generated by the plugin. If specified as an object, the following keys are supported: { n, e, s, w, ne, se, sw, nw }. The value of any specified should be a jQuery selector matching the child element of the resizable to use as that handle. If the handle is not a child of the resizable, you can pass in the DOMElement or a valid jQuery object directly.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.ResizableOptions.HelperCssClass
member.summary: Gets/Sets the css class that will be added to a proxy element to outline the resize during the drag of the resize handle. Once the resize is complete, the original element is sized.

member.summary: Gets/Sets the maximum height the resizable should be allowed to resize to.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DraggableOptions.ConnectToSortable
member.summary: Allows the draggable to be dropped onto the specified sortables
member.remarks: If this propety is used (helper must be set to 'Clone' in order to work flawlessly), a draggable can be dropped onto a sortable list and then becomes part of it.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DraggableOptions.AllowAddClasses
member.summary: Gets/Sets whether prevent the ui-draggable class from being added.
member.remarks: This may be desired as a performance optimization when using Draggable on many hundreds of elements.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DraggableOptions.PreventiFrameCapturing
member.summary: Gets/Sets whether prevent iframes from capturing the mousemove events during a drag.
member.remarks: Useful in combination with cursorAt, or in any case, if the mouse cursor is not over the helper. If set to true, transparent overlays will be placed over all iframes on the page. If a selector is supplied, the matched iframes will have an overlay placed over them.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DraggableOptions.RefreshPositions
member.summary: Gets/Sets whether droppable positions are calculated on every mousemove.
member.remarks: Caution: This solves issues on highly dynamic pages, but dramatically decreases performance.

member.summary: Gets/Sets whether the element will return to its start position when dragging stops.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DraggableOptions.RevertDuration
member.summary: Gets/Sets the duration of the revert animation, in milliseconds. Ignored if Revert is NotSet.

member.summary: Gets/Sets the group sets of draggable and droppable items, in addition to droppable's Accept Property.

member.summary: Gets/Sets whether auto binding the element's value as parameters to send to the specified url.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.Confirm
member.summary: Gets or sets the junction to call for a confirmation.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.OnError
member.summary: A function to be called if the request fails.
member.remarks: he function is passed three arguments: The XMLHttpRequest object, a string describing the type of error that occurred and an optional exception object, if one occurred. Possible values for the second argument (besides null) are "timeout", "error", "notmodified" and "parsererror".

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.OnBeforeSend
member.summary: A pre-callback to modify the XMLHttpRequest object before it is sent. Use this to set custom headers etc. The XMLHttpRequest is passed as the only argument. This is an Ajax Event. You may return false in function to cancel the request.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.OnComplete
member.summary: A function to be called when the request finishes (after success and error callbacks are executed). The function gets passed two arguments: The XMLHttpRequest object and a string describing the type of success of the request.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.OnSuccess
member.summary: A function to be called if the request success. T
member.remarks: he function gets passed two arguments: The data returned from the server, formatted according to the 'dataType' parameter, and a string describing the status.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.HttpMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP method.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.Url
member.summary: The URL to request. This *must* be a string (e.g., document.location.href) and not a Location object (e.g., document.location)

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.Data
member.summary: Data to be sent to the server. It is converted to a query string, if not already a string.
member.remarks: It's appended to the url for GET-requests. See processData option to prevent this automatic processing. Object must be Key/Value pairs. If value is an Array, jQuery serializes multiple values with same key i.e. {foo:["bar1", "bar2"]} becomes '&foo=bar1&foo=bar2'.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.DataType
member.summary: The type of data that you're expecting back from the server. If none is specified, jQuery will intelligently pass either responseXML or responseText to your success callback, based on the MIME type of the response. The available types (and the result passed as the first argument to your success callback) are:

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.AsyncMode
member.summary: By default, all requests are sent asynchronous (i.e. this is set to true by default). If you need synchronous requests, set this option to false. Note that synchronous requests may temporarily lock the browser, disabling any actions while the request is active.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.EnableCache
member.summary: Added in jQuery 1.2, if set to false it will force the pages that you request to not be cached by the browser.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.ContentType
member.summary: When sending data to the server, use this content-type. Default is "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", which is fine for most cases.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.TriggerGlobalAjaxEvent
member.summary: Whether to trigger global AJAX event handlers for this request. The default is true. Set to false to prevent the global handlers like ajaxStart or ajaxStop from being triggered. This can be used to control various Ajax Events.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.IfModified
member.summary: Allow the request to be successful only if the response has changed since the last request. This is done by checking the Last-Modified header. Default value is false, ignoring the header.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.Jsonp
member.summary: Override the callback function name in a jsonp request. This value will be used instead of 'callback' in the 'callback=?' part of the query string in the url for a GET or the data for a POST. So {jsonp:'onJsonPLoad'} would result in 'onJsonPLoad=?' passed to the server.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.Username
member.summary: A username to be used in response to an HTTP access authentication request.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.Password
member.summary: A password to be used in response to an HTTP access authentication request.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.ProcessData
member.summary: By default, data passed in to the data option as an object (technically, anything other than a string) will be processed and transformed into a query string, fitting to the default content-type "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". If you want to send DOMDocuments, or other non-processed data, set this option to false.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.ScriptCharset
member.summary: Only for requests with 'jsonp' or 'script' dataType and GET type. Forces the request to be interpreted as a certain charset. Only needed for charset differences between the remote and local content.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Set a local timeout (in milliseconds) for the request. This will override the global timeout, if one is set via $.ajaxSetup. For example, you could use this property to give a single request a longer timeout than all other requests that you've set to time out in one second.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.jQueryAjaxOptions.DataFilter
member.summary: A function to be used to handle the raw responsed data of XMLHttpRequest.This is a pre-filtering function to sanitize the response.You should return the sanitized data.The function gets passed two arguments: The raw data returned from the server, and the 'dataType' parameter.

member.name: T:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions
member.summary: Defines the jQuery UI DatePicker options.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.AppendText
member.summary: Gets/Sets the text to display after each date field, e.g. to show the required format.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ButtonImageUrl
member.summary: Gets/Sets the URL for the popup button image. If set, button text becomes the alt value and is not directly displayed.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ShowButtonImageOnly
member.summary: Set to true to place an image after the field to use as the trigger without it appearing on a button.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.AnotherFormatString
member.summary: Gets/Sets the dateFormat to be used for the altField option. This allows one date format to be shown to the user for selection purposes, while a different format is actually sent behind the scenes. For a full list of the possible formats see the formatDate function

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.AnotherField
member.summary: Gets/Sets the jQuery server side selector for another field that is to be updated with the selected date from the datepicker. Use the altFormat setting below to change the format of the date within this field. Leave as blank for no alternate field.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ButtonText
member.summary: Gets/Sets the text to display on the trigger button.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.AllowChangeMonth
member.summary: Gets/Sets whether the DatePicker allows you to change the month by selecting from a drop-down list. You can enable this feature by setting the property to true.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.AllowChangeYear
member.summary: Gets/Sets whether the DatePicker allows you to change the year by selecting from a drop-down list. You can enable this feature by setting the attribute to true.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.CloseButtonText
member.summary: Gets/Sets The text to display for the close link. This attribute is one of the regionalisation attributes. Use the ShowButtonPanel to display this button.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ConstrainInput
member.summary: True if the input field is constrained to the current date format.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.TextForToday
member.summary: Gets/Sets the text to display for the current day link. This attribute is one of the regionalisation attributes. Use the ShowButtonPanel to display this button.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.LocID
member.summary: Gets/Sets the region id for the datepicker

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.DateFormatString
member.summary: Gets/Sets the format for parsed and displayed dates.
member.remarks: DatePicker Web Control not use jQuery's dateFormat,you can using the DateFormat in .Net.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.DayNames
member.summary: Gets the collection of long day names, starting from Sunday, for use as requested via the dateFormat setting. They also appear as popup hints when hovering over the corresponding column headings. This attribute is one of the regionalisation attributes.

remarks.para: The DayNames default value is below

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ShortDayNames
member.summary: Gets the colleciton of abbreviated day names, starting from Sunday, for use as requested via the dateFormat setting. This attribute is one of the regionalisation attributes.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.MinDayNames
member.summary: Gets the collection of minimised day names, starting from Sunday, for use as column headers within the datepicker. This attribute is one of the regionalisation attributes.
member.remarks: Default value:'Su', 'Mo', 'Tu', 'We', 'Th', 'Fr', 'Sa'

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.DefaultDateString
member.summary: Gets/Sets the date to highlight on first opening if the field is blank.
member.remarks: Specify either an actual date via a Date object, or a number of days from today (e.g. +7) or a string of values and periods ('y' for years, 'm' for months, 'w' for weeks, 'd' for days, e.g. '+1m +7d'), or null for today.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.Duration
member.summary: Control the speed at which the datepicker appears, it may be a time in milliseconds

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.FirstDayOfWeek
member.summary: Gets/Sets the first day of the week:
member.remarks: Sunday is 0, Monday is 1, ... This property is one of the regionalisation properties.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.MoveToSelectedDate
member.summary: Gets/Sets whether the current day link moves to the currently selected date instead of today.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.HideIfNoPrevNext
member.summary: Gets/Sets normally the previous and next links are disabled when not applicable (see minDate/maxDate). You can hide them altogether by setting this attribute to true.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.MaxDateFormat
member.summary: Gets/Sets a maximum selectable date via a Date object, or a number of days from today (e.g. +7) or a string of values and periods ('y' for years, 'm' for months, 'w' for weeks, 'd' for days, e.g. '+1m +1w'), or null for no limit.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.MinDateFormat
member.summary: Gets/Sets a minimum selectable date via a Date object, or a number of days from today (e.g. +7) or a string of values and periods ('y' for years, 'm' for months, 'w' for weeks, 'd' for days, e.g. '-1y -1m'), or null for no limit.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.MonthNames
member.summary: Gets the collection of full month names, as used in the month header on each datepicker and as requested via the dateFormat setting. This attribute is one of the regionalisation attributes.
member.remarks: Default value:'January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December'

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.MonthShortNames
member.summary: Gets the collection of abbreviated month names, for use as requested via the dateFormat setting. This attribute is one of the regionalisation attributes.
member.remarks: Default value:'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec'

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.NavigationAsDateFormat
member.summary: Gets/sets the formatDate function is applied to the prevText, nextText, and currentText values before display, allowing them to display the target month names for example.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.NextMonthText
member.summary: Gets/Sets the text to display for the next month link. This attribute is one of the regionalisation attributes. With the standard ThemeRoller styling, this value is replaced by an icon.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.NumberOfMonths
member.summary: Gets/Sets how many months to show at once. The value can be a straight integer, or can be a two-element array to define the number of rows and columns to display.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.PrevMonthText
member.summary: Gets/Sets the text to display for the previous month link.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ShortYearCutOff
member.summary: Gets/Sets the cutoff year for determining the century for a date (used in conjunction with dateFormat 'y'). If a numeric value (0-99) is provided then this value is used directly. If a string value is provided then it is converted to a number and added to the current year. Once the cutoff year is calculated, any dates entered with a year value less than or equal to it are considered to be in the current century, while those greater than it are deemed to be in the previous century.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.AnimationOnShow
member.summary: Gets/Sets the name of the animation used to show/hide the datepicker.
member.remarks: Use 'show' (the default), 'slideDown', 'fadeIn', or any of the show/hide jQuery UI effects.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ShowButtonPanel
member.summary: Gets/Sets whether to show the button panel.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ShowCurrentAtPos
member.summary: Gets/Sets where in a multi-month display the current month shows, starting from 0 at the top/left.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ShowMonthAfterYear
member.summary: Gets/Sets whether to show the month after the year in the header.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ShowIconMode
member.summary: Gets/Sets the datepicker appear automatically when the field receives focus ('focus'), appear only when a button is clicked ('button'), or appear when either event takes place ('both').

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ShowOptions
member.summary: Gets/Sets if using one of the jQuery UI effects for AnimationOnShow, you can provide additional settings for that animation via this option.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.ShowOtherMonths
member.summary: Gets/Sets display dates in other months (non-selectable) at the start or end of the current month.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.StepMonths
member.summary: Gets/Sets how many months to move when clicking the Previous/Next links.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.YearRange
member.summary: Gets/Sets control the range of years displayed in the year drop-down: either relative to current year (-nn:+nn) or absolute (nnnn:nnnn).

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.DisplayMode
member.summary: Gets/Sets the DatePicker's DisplayMode

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.IsRightToLeft
member.summary: Gets/Sets whether the current language is drawn from right to left.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.Value
member.summary: Gets/Sets the DatePicker 's select value

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.OnBeforeShow
member.summary: Can be a function that takes an input field and current datepicker instance and returns an options object to update the datepicker with. It is called just before the datepicker is displayed.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.OnBeforeShowDay
member.summary: The function takes a date as a parameter and must return an array with [0] equal to true/false indicating whether or not this date is selectable, [1] equal to a CSS class name(s) or '' for the default presentation and [2] an optional popup tooltip for this date. It is called for each day in the datepicker before is it displayed.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.OnChangeMonthYear
member.summary: Allows you to define your own event when the datepicker moves to a new month and/or year. The function receives the selected year, month and the datepicker instance as parameters. this refers to the associated input field.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.OnClose
member.summary: Allows you to define your own event when the datepicker is closed, whether or not a date is selected. The function receives the selected date as a Date and the datepicker instance as parameters. this refers to the associated input field.

member.name: P:DNA.Mvc.jQuery.DatePickerOptions.OnSelect
member.summary: Allows you to define your own event when the datepicker is selected. The function receives the selected date(s) as text and the datepicker instance as parameters. this refers to the associated input field.
